title: Project Proposal
text: In this R Shiny application, we analyze the rental prices of flats in Singapore using Geographically Weighted Regression (GWR). This analysis aims to predict and examine the spatial dynamics of rental prices, primarily focusing on the influence of factors such as proximity to transportation hubs. By examining how predictors like access to public transportation and neighborhood characteristics affect rental prices across various towns, we hope to facilitate more informed decision-making in the context of Singapore’s unique urban landscape. This application will provide a visual representation of rental price dynamics and serve as a valuable tool for individuals considering where to rent a flat.

title: Data Sources
text:
Below are the data sources utilised in this project:

Through Wikipedia and webscraping with the coordinates retrieved through OneMap API

title: About
text:
Meet UrbanScope: Mapping Your Next Move
UrbanScope isn’t just another data project—it’s your personal guide to finding the perfect rental flat in Singapore. Born from our passion for solving real-world problems through data, we created this tool to help you make more informed rental choices. Why? Because we know that where you live should be more than just an address—it should be a strategic decision.

Who We Are:

Pan Ming Wei
Georgia Ng
Brian Lim



Why We Built This:
In light of recent MRT disruptions, we saw a need to understand how public transport accessibility impacts housing prices. With Singapore’s rental market becoming more competitive, we wanted to create a tool that helps users make informed decisions by understanding the true value of location.
Whether you’re searching for a home near your office or looking for the best deal near an MRT station, UrbanScope helps you navigate the rental market with confidence.

UrbanScope: Making sense of Singapore’s rental scene, one flat at a time.

title: UrbanScope
text:
Welcome to UrbanScope’s Rental Explorer!
Built with the power of Quarto, hosted on Netlify, and driven by R programming, our interactive tool lets you explore the ever-changing landscape of Singapore’s rental market. Our cutting-edge tool combines the power of Geographically Weighted Regression (GWR) with interactive visuals, allowing you to explore how proximity to MRT stations, bus stops, and other key factors influence rental prices.

What Can You Do Here?

Interactive Experience: Adjust inputs and watch the rental map of Singapore come alive with instant insights.
Explore Key Trends: Dive deep into the impact of transportation access, neighborhood vibes, and property features on rental prices.
Get Accurate Predictions: Enter any location and let our predictive model forecast the likely rental price based on surrounding amenities and transport links.


Ready to make smarter rental decisions? Let’s get started!
UrbanScope – Helping you navigate Singapore’s rental market like a pro.
